item.title: Investigation into fraudulent AEO appointments underway
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: A major scandal involving fake certificates has come to light in Jogulamba Gadwal district, where several individuals are reportedly employed in government jobs using fraudulent documents. Upon receiving information, the police launched an investigation, leading to the detention of those involved in produc-ing fake certificates and two employees who secured jobs using them.
According to sources, in 2017, a group of individuals allegedly used forged certificates to secure jobs as Agricul...]]>
item.author: The Hans India
